snippet.title: Good Kid - Ghost King's Revenge (Official Video Game Trailer)
snippet.description:
Play the game here: https://goodkidofficial.com/game
The dastardly Ghost King and his friends have stolen our mascot Nomu Kid. We need YOUR help to get him back. Run, Duck and Jump through the streets of Toronto, dodging ghosts and raccoons! Now with 5 challenging bosses, powerful power-ups, and shiny 8-bit versions of your favorite Good Kid songs (it’s all of them, they should all be your favorites :|)

Trailer by Colton David
https://twitter.com/mrboyfriend666

Don't forget to subscribe for more music!

💰 Bandcamp: http://goodkid.bandcamp.com/
👕 Merch: https://goodkidofficial.com/merch/
🗣 Discord (Street Team): https://goodkid.eo.page/3g1h5
📸 Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/goodkidband
🐦 Twitter: https://twitter.com/goodkidband
🎖 Patreon: https://www.patreon.com/goodkidband
🎵 Stream the songs: https://ffm.to/goodkid
💌 Mailing List: https://goodkid.eo.page/fhbcc
